case.title: Handsome hung guy seeking east indian / middle eastern - m4w - 29
case.text: Attractive well endowed male looking for discreet relationship with Indian / Middle Eastern female. If you are single and just too busy to have a relationship, this would be prefect situation. If you are in a relationship and you are not compatible with your lover and missing romance in your life feel free to reply as well. I am not indian or midde eastern, I am european, so please be ok with that. I am not looking for one night stand or short term relationship. Seeking on-going discreet friends with benefits situation. Reply with a pic and some info about yourself. subject to "seeking" that way I know you are real.
